He gained popularity for his music in movies like Alemari, Varadanayaka, Power, Chakravyuha, and Bhajarangi. Chandan Shetty also emerged as the winner of Bigg Boss Kannada Season 5, showcasing his talent and strong presence in the industry.

name: Road to Kurukshetra Ft. Kay Mallani
about: Kay Mallani, an Indo Tech artist, skillfully blends India’s traditions with modern electronic music in tracks like "Vishnu," "Kalki," and "Parajaye." Known for his progressive house beats infused with spiritual themes, his music creates a deeply immersive experience. Indo Tech will host him on October 19th at Echo Lounge for the Road to Kurukshetra event, inspired by the Mahabharata. His latest release, "Parajaye," features haunting Indian melodies and deep rhythms, capturing the essence of struggle and resilience that embodies the legendary battlefield of Kurukshetra.
